title: April Love Geary defines California cool in flowing tank with Capri jeans
text:
They have their hands full raising a growing family, but April Love Geary and Robin Thicke enjoyed some time just with each other on Monday.

The couple were spotted grabbing lunch together at Soho's Little Beach House Malibu.

April, 24, looked California cool in a lightweight white tank top, Capri jeans, and a nude pair of flats as she left the restaurant with her husband, 42.

Let's do lunch! April Love Geary enjoyed a low-key lunch date with her fiance Robin Thicke at Little Beach House Malibu on Monday

She slung a quilted Yves Saint Laurent purse over her shoulder while protecting her eyes with a cool pair of shades.

The busy mom-of-two looked as if she had places to be as she strode through the parking lot with her cell phone in hand.

Robin, meanwhile, kept it cool in a black T-shirt, cap, and silver chain necklace.

Though they did not appear to be joined by their children for lunch, April was back with their little ones in no time.

Walk this way! Geary nailed California cool in Capril jeans and nude flats

Keeping it casual! Robin, meanwhile, kept it cool in a black T-shirt, cap, and silver chain necklace

The young mother posted a photo of her blue eye daughter Mia Love Thicke wearing her hair up in pigtails along with metallic pink cowboy boots.

'Stop growing,' she captioned the photo, along with a crying emoji.

In addition to Mia, April and Robin share daughter Lola, who was born just seven months ago.

They grow so fast! The young mother posted a photo of her blue eye daughter Mia Love Thicke wearing metallic pink cowboy boots and her hair in pigtails

Baby girl: Geary showered Lola with kisses while posting a video of their cuddle session onto Instagram

April shared a heart-melting video of Lola squealing in delight as she rested in her mother's arms.

The doting mom peppered her daughter's head with kisses as she held onto the tot.

Robin also shares son Julian Fuego, nine, with his ex-wife Paula Patton, who he was married to from 2005 to 2015.
